==Description==
This [[Conditional Tags|Conditional Tag]] checks if the given id, slug, or name is a navigation menu. This is a boolean function, meaning it returns either TRUE or FALSE.

==Usage==
%%%<?php is_nav_menu( $id ); ?>%%%

==Parameters==
{{Parameter|$id|mixed|Menu ID, Menu Name or Menu Slug}}

==Return Values==
; <tt>(boolean)</tt> : True on success, false on failure.
